[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.CrossChain/CrossChainContract_View.cs] [Function: GetIndexingProposalStatus()] [Expired Proposal Handling] Are expired proposals (proposalInfo.ExpiredTime < current time) properly filtered or indicated, or can they remain in pending status indefinitely? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.CrossChain/CrossChainContract_View.cs] [Function: GetIndexingProposalStatus()] [Proposer Validation] Is chainIndexingProposal.Proposer validated to match actual proposal creator, or can fake proposer addresses be injected? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.CrossChain/CrossChainContract_View.cs] [Function: GetSideChainIndexingFeePrice()] [Price Overflow] Can IndexingPrice overflow Int64.MaxValue causing arithmetic errors in fee calculation logic that multiplies price by block counts? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.CrossChain/CrossChainContract_View.cs] [Function: GetSideChainIndexingFeePrice()] [Price Staleness] If fee prices are not updated with chain status changes (e.g., during termination), can outdated prices be used for incorrect fee assessments? (Low)
